titleStmt.title: Episcopal government instituted by Christ, and confirmed by cleere evidence of Scripture, and invincible reason. / Collected by the pains of R.R. Preacher of the Gospell.
titleStmt.author: Rollock, Robert, 1555?-1599.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "ollock a good" is written in after 'R.R' and above 'preacher of the gospell'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
